resources.string: This app is a Stress Management application and helping you in relieving stress.We are provides breathing exercises to help you clam down and de-stress. Stress testing are provided to allow you to understand more about yourself. Music and video section to aid relaxation.
This stress test use the Perceived Stress Scale(PSS). you will be asked a series of multiple choice lifestyle questions around common stressors. At the end of the test you will be given a score
